<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swashbuckler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6233) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=659" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=235)

**Prerequisites**
Charisma +2; Dexterity +2

</column>

---

Choose a swashbuckler’s style. You gain the panache class feature, and you apply the bravado trait to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=2370) and any actions indicated in your swashbuckler style, allowing you to gain panache. You become trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) or the skill associated with your style. If you were already trained in both skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in swashbuckler class DC. You don’t gain any other effects of your chosen style.

<title level="2">Swashbuckler Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Flair](/Feats.aspx?ID=6234), [Evasiveness](/Feats.aspx?ID=6239), [Finishing Precision](/Feats.aspx?ID=6235), [Swashbuckler's Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=6237), [Swashbuckler's Speed](/Feats.aspx?ID=6238)
name: Swashbuckler Dedication
